channel.title: Need help with a quick thing
channel.description:
hi guys when i compile my source i get no errors but when i run my source i get this
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:365) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:61)
i was trying to add completionist cape and idk how to fix? please comment if you know how to fix

item.title: Need help with a quick thing
item.dc:creator: @iiz_code_iiz iiz code iiz
item.description:
@iiz_code_iiz wrote:

[quote=“XXrRrXX, post:2, topic:452903”]you corrupted the cache so you need to delete it!
Download a cache were the cape already is in![/quote]

no? i fixed it with the run thing wrong sorry but thx for trying to help

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a quick thing

item.title: Need help with a quick thing
item.dc:creator: @XXrRrXX XXrRrXX
item.description:
@XXrRrXX wrote:

you corrupted the cache so you need to delete it!
Download a cache were the cape already is in!

Read full topic
